item.title: Trump weighs using U.S. military to acquire Greenland: White House
item.description: President Donald Trump is considering "a range of options" in order to acquire Greenland, including "utilizing the U.S. Military," the White House sai...

item.title: Resolution to block Trump from invading Greenland introduced by Sen. Gallego
item.description: Concerns about U.S. action against Greenland have grown after the U.S. attack on Venezuela, which led to the capture of leader Nicolas Maduro.

item.title: Republican Rep. Doug LaMalfa dies at 65
item.description: LaMalfa's death is a critical shift in the balance of power in the U.S. House of Representatives, tightening Republicans' razor-thin majority.

item.title: Hilton Hotels removing Minneapolis franchise location after it again denied DHS booking
item.description: Minneapolis, which has a large Somali community, has become a focus of criticism by the Trump administration, which has surged ICE agents there.

item.title: George Conway, persistent Trump critic, is running for Congress in New York
item.description: Conway joins a flood of Democrats looking to take over Nadler's seat, including Jack Schlossberg, the grandson of John F. Kennedy.
